EmailTemplate.name: Expense Sheet is Approved by Finance
EmailTemplate.subject: Expense approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Zumzum__Expense_Sheet__c.OwnerFirstName},
The following expense has been approved by Parent services and passed to Finance for final approval prior to payment:
Expense ID: {!Zumzum__Expense_Sheet__c.Name}
Payment will be sent within 30 days of this approval.
Please log into your portal to view any details.
Kind regards NCT
